data.title: Best Movies Like Deserter
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Deserter: Our Girl (2013), Sword of Honour (2001), The American Dream (2011), My Best Enemy (2011), 4 Days in May (2011), April 9th (2015), Colditz (2005), Dresden (2006), Fires on the Plain (2014), Intimate Enemies (2007)
